translations: v.醒，睡醒；苏醒；叫醒，唤醒；唤起（awake 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: We were awoken by a pounding at the door.
sentences.translation: 我们被砰砰的敲门声吵醒。

sentences.sentence: I had to jump out of bed and run to silence it before my family was awoken.
sentences.translation: 在我的家人被吵醒之前，我不得不跳下床跑去把它关掉。

sentences.sentence: At the very least, it has awoken us from our national fever dream of easy riches and bigger houses, and put a necessary end to an era of reckless personal spending.
sentences.translation: 至少，它让我们从轻易致富和拥有更大房子的狂热梦想中醒来，并为一个不计后果的个人消费时代画上了一个必然的句号。
